CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PersonMailingPostalCode)) || NOT(ISBLANK(PersonOtherPostalCode)) || NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode)) || NOT(ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode)), true,false )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Will be True if any postcode field is filled in on the Customer profile
CustomField.label: Address Populated
